welcome_message_body: Welcome to Buenaventura, the vibrant port city known for its beautiful beaches, rich Afro-Colombian culture, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer during your stay!

restaurants.name: Sandwich Qbano Viva Buenaventura
restaurants.description: Sandwich Qbano Viva Buenaventura is a sandwich spot located in Buenaventura.
restaurants.address: C.C. Brisas Plaza Shopping (Local 324), Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca
